#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main(){
	int n,m,h,t=0,s[1010];double val=1;
	cin>>n>>m>>h;
	for (int i = 1; i <=m; ++i)
	{
		cin>>s[i];
		t+=s[i];
	}
	if(t<n){
		cout<<"-1";
		return 0;
	}
	else if(t-s[h]<n-1){
		cout<<"1";
		return 0;
	}
	else
	{	double k=t-s[h];
		double g=t-1;
		while(k>0){
		val*=k/g;
		k--;
		g--;
		}
		double p=t-s[h]-n+1;
		double q=t-n;
		while(p>0){
		val*=q/p;
		q--;
		p--;
		}
		while(g>0){
			val*=q/g;
			g--;
			q--;
		}

		cout<<(1-val);
		return 0;
	}

}
